factory.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a building or group of buildings in which goods are produced in large quantities, using machines
factory.translation[0].note_box[0].secti: There is a large car factory where many of the local people work.
The factory workers are threatening to go on strike.
The factory owner placed a large order for some new equipment.
He held the position of factory manager.
Factory inspectors reported that safety precautions had been ignored.
A crowd of protesters had gathered outside the factory gates.
The company has just opened a new factory in Swindon.
The factory was closed down in 2006.
Donna works in a shoe factory.
The factory produces an incredible 100 cars per hour.
factory.translation[0].note_box[1].secti: factory
a building or group of buildings in which goods are produced in large quantities, using machines
She works in a chocolate factory.
a clothing factory
a large factory where cars, chemicals, or energy is produced
Local residents are protesting about the new nuclear power plant.
a car plant
a nuclear power plant
facility
a factory. Facility is often used instead of factory  in business English
The new production facility is one of the most up-to-date in the area.
works
used in the following compounds to describe a factory that produces a particular thing
mill
a factory that produces paper, cotton, or cloth
a paper mill
The textile mill has been converted into luxury flats.
shipyard
a place where ships are built or repaired
The vessel was built in the Kobe shipyard.
foundry
a factory where metal is made into things using moulds
Mandela’s statue was cast here in a local foundry.
sweatshop
a small factory where people work hard in bad conditions for very little money
The company was fined for selling goods produced in sweatshops.
factory.translation[1].definitions[0].de: a large building or group of buildings where goods are made, using large industrial machinery and usually employing many people
factory.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: The owner wouldn’t comment on the factory’s future.
